price: Молу сарваташ ва он чӣ ба даст оварда буд, ба ӯ суде набахшид
arabic: مَآ أَغۡنَىٰ عَنۡهُ مَالُهُۥ وَمَا كَسَبَ

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: mā aghnā ʿanhu māluhu wamā kasaba
